title: Mobile/fixed market share of Vodafone in its main markets 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
In Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Mobile market had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Country Spain out of all 6 Countrys.
Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Spain had the biggest gap of 289.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Mobile market.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
In Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Mobile market had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Country Spain out of all 6 Countrys.
Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Spain had the biggest gap of 289.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Mobile market.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

Out of all 2 groups, Mobile market had the highest Market share in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Fixed market had the lowest Market share in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
Among all the Countrys, Mobile market had the highest Market share 463.0 in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and lowest value 174.0 in Country Spain.
There is a gap of 289.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Mobile market in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Spain.
Among the groups, Mobile market had the biggest difference in Market share. Where the maximum Market share was 2.66 times larger than the minimum Market share.
On average, the Country Germany had the highest Market share for all 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. Whereas United Kingdom had the lowest average Market share.
